about_the_game: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.  Wing Pro is an integrated development environment designed specifically for the Python programming language. It integrates powerful editing, testing, debugging, and project management features to help reduce development and debugging time, cut down on coding errors, and make it easier to understand and navigate Python code. Wing Pro an be used to develop any kind of Python code for web, GUI, game, embedded scripting, and other applications.
detailed_description: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.  Wing Pro is an integrated development environment designed specifically for the Python programming language. It integrates powerful editing, testing, debugging, and project management features to help reduce development and debugging time, cut down on coding errors, and make it easier to understand and navigate Python code. Wing Pro an be used to develop any kind of Python code for web, GUI, game, embedded scripting, and other applications.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc version 2.15+
  • Processor: x64 Intel (remote debug to x32 Intel and ARM Linux)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Wing Pro is a Python IDE with powerful debugger and intelligent editor that make interactive Python development fast, accurate, and fun. Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.
